column1: Stem Cell Engineering For Regenerative Medicine - MSc
column3: College of Medical, Veterinary & Life Sciences
column5: Watch our latest Ask your academic webinar to find out more about this programme.Our aim is to train a new generation of researchers with expertise in stem cell culture, engineering, regulation and translation in the regenerative medicine space, to help fill the skills shortage in the industrial life sciences sector.The UK and further afield hosts a rapidly growing regenerative medicine sector with major centres focused on production of cellular and acellular therapies and a growth of clinical trialling. Therefore, there is increasing demand for recruits with highly specialised regenerative medicine experience.
column7: Watch our latest Ask your academic webinar to find out more about this programme.
